titles.title: Health Care Tax Deduction Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for amounts paid for health insurance and prescription drug costs of individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E22-23)

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Health Care Tax Deduction Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a tax deduction from gross income for health insurance premiums and unreimbursed prescription drug expenses paid for the benefit of the taxpayer, the taxpayer's spouse and dependents.
